channel.title: Mute does not work
channel.description: Well, if I try muting someone, it says "Namehere" was muted. And their name goes in my mutes folder. But they don't get muted in-game. If anybody could help me fix I'd really appreciate it.

item.title: Mute does not work
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

runescapepkserver:

Well, if I try muting someone, it says “Namehere” was muted. And their name goes in my mutes folder. But they don’t get muted in-game. If anybody could help me fix I’d really appreciate it.

Coding error. It’s that, or you’re simply missing the code that makes people “muted”.
Not sure what to put in, though. :s

Read full topic
